medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Mr. ___ began experiencing crampy umbilical pain at about 22:30 last night. He felt the urge to have a bowel movement but was unable to. After returning home around 03:30 this morning, he took a warm bath with no relief. Over the next few hours, the pain migrated to the right lower quadrant and increased in severity, with mild nausea but no vomiting. He had a small normal bowel movement with no change in symptoms and has had no flatus since. He presented to the emergency department around 9 AM, reporting decreased appetite and that pain worsens with movement.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus, past laparoscopic umbilical herniorrhaphy, wisdom teeth removal
medical_history.family_history: Father has a history of congestive heart failure, uncle with liver metastasis
